title: Federal Reserve trails global counterparts in balance sheet reductions, data reveals
description:
Quick Take The Federal Reserve’s balance sheet of total assets has seen a reduction of an additional $75 billion in the past week, with total assets now slightly surpassing the 8 trillion mark. For context, prior to the COVID-19 pandemic, the Fed’s balance sheet was approximately $3.5 trillion. Despite the considerable distance yet to be […]

The post Federal Reserve trails global counterparts in balance sheet reductions, data reveals appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: India to develop dark net monitoring tool to combat crypto fraud: Report
description: The tool will monitor crypto wallets and alert the Indian Ministry of Home Affairs about irregular transactions, according to a report.

title: Stablecoin Shake-Up: Binance Drops BUSD as New Contenders Rise, Reveals CCData Research
description: CCData, a renowned FCA-authorized benchmark administrator and global leader in digital asset data, has unveiled the September 2023 edition of its “Stablecoins & CBDCs Report”. The CCData Stablecoins Report is designed to highlight significant trends and activities in the stablecoins industry. The report centers on evaluations concerning market capitalization and trading volumes of various stablecoins, breaking […]

title: Tether Resumes USDT Loans Nearly A Year After Discontinuing Them
description: Tether has reported an increase in USDT-denominated loans in its latest quarterly financial update.

title: Bitcoin advocate reiterates theory linking NSA to Bitcoin’s creation
description: A long-standing theory suggesting the involvement of the United States National Security Agency (NSA) in the creation of Bitcoin has resurfaced recently. This theory gained new attention after Daniel Roberts, co-founder of Iris Energy, posted screenshots of a 1996 research paper titled “How to Make a Mint: The Cryptography of Anonymous Electronic Cash.” Notably, this ... title: WazirX says India will likely keep onerous crypto taxes until 2025
description: Tax relief for crypto transactions in India is unlikely for at least two more years, according to WazirX CEO Nischal Shetty

title: Polygon, Arbitrum, and Pomerdoge garner attention from analysts
description: Analysts believe that Polygon (MATIC), Arbitrum (ARB), and Pomerdoge (POMD) have potential as sub-$1 tokens

title: India and UAE Seal Landmark Oil Deal, Furthering BRICS De-Dollarization Efforts and Embracing Bitcoin (BTC)
description: India and the UAE have advanced efforts to conduct cross-border trades without the US Dollar. This aligns with the BRICS effort to de-dollarize their respective economies. Some member countries of the BRICS Group have taken certain steps that are in favor of the bloc’s plan to contest the potential hegemony of the United States Dollar [...]

title: Bearish Signs for Binance Coin (BNB), While Monero (XMR) and Borroe.Finance ($ROE) Gain Traction with Positive Price Projections
description: As regulatory pressure continues to mount, crypto exchange Binance has found itself on the receiving end, making Binance Coin (BNB) feel the pain. title: Pokemon NFTs on Polygon: The $5 Boosters That Turned Into $50 Goldmines
description: Tokenized Pokemon cards in the form of NFTs minted on the Polygon network have sold out in seconds with its floor price skyrocketing.
